page.topic: How do I revoke an API Key?
page.description: API Keys that have been created to access the TransForm API can be revoked.

description.p: Revoking an API key terminantes access to the TransForm API for a TransForm account.
To revoke an API key, log in to *[extlink:TransForm Central@https://transform.alphasoftware.com]*.
Click the *[ui:Home]* tab, then under *[ui:Developer Options]* click *[ui:Revoke API Key]*.
Enter the API Key to revoke. Then click *[ui:Revoke API Key]*. *[There is no undo for this action.]*

tip.p: You can use the [GetAPIKeys] TransForm API Endpoint to look up all API keys for a TransForm Account.

see.ref: How do I create an API Key?
